bullet.title: design
bullet.writeup: Design work is a pillar of engineering. Starting from neutral, a designer expresses a solution in which intricate features link to a thematic core.

bullet.title: mining
bullet.writeup: Data mining leverages public protocols, interfaces, and inventive retrieval methods to extract structured data from various database framework sets.

bullet.title: modeling
bullet.writeup: Mathematical models encourage exploratory analysis through computational reducibility and calibrated simulation. Models form an analogous system to test theories and adjust inputs. When done well, they can forecast outcomes within a quantifiable error range, though they are best deployed when engineered to answer very specific questions.
